column3: See also codes 17 and 18

column2: Publisher’s website for a specified work
column3: A publisher’s informative and/or promotional webpage relating to a specified work (book, journal, online resource or other publication type)
A webpage giving access to an online content hosting service as a whole
A webpage giving general information about a serial, in print or electronic format or both.
A webpage giving direct access to the content that is available online for a specified serial version.
A webpage maintained by an author or other contributor about her/his publications and personal background

column2: Publisher’s website relating to specified contributor
column3: A publisher’s webpage devoted to a specific author or other contributor

column2: Other publisher’s website relating to specified contributor
column3: A webpage devoted to a specific author or other contributor, and maintained by a publisher other than the publisher of the item described in the ONIX record

column2: Third-party website relating to specified contributor
column3: A webpage devoted to a specific author or other contributor, and maintained by a third party (eg a fan site)

column2: Contributor’s own website for specified work
column3: A webpage maintained by an author or other contributor and specific to an individual work

column2: Other publisher’s website relating to specified work
column3: A webpage devoted to an individual work, and maintained by a publisher other than the publisher of the item described in the ONIX record

column2: Third-party website relating to specified work
column3: A webpage devoted to an individual work, and maintained by a third party (eg a fan site)

column2: Contributor’s own website for group or series of works
column3: A webpage maintained by an author or other contributor and specific to a group or series of works

column2: Publisher’s website relating to group or series of works
column3: A publisher’s webpage devoted to a group or series of works

column2: Other publisher’s website relating to group or series of works
column3: A webpage devoted to a group or series of works, and maintained by a publisher other than the publisher of the item described in the ONIX record

column2: Third-party website relating to group or series of works (eg a fan site)
column3: A webpage devoted to a group or series of works, and maintained by a third party (eg a fan site)
Use instead of code 01 to specify a publisher’s website for trade users
Use instead of code 01 to specify a publisher’s website for consumers

column2: Web page for author presentation / commentary
Web page for other commentary / discussion

column3: URL needed by the German National Library for direct access, harvesting and storage of an electronic resource.
Link needed by German Books in Print (VLB) for DOI registration and ONIX DOI conversion.
A corporate website operated by a distributor or other supplier (not the publisher)
A website operated by a distributor or other supplier (not the publisher) and aimed at trade customers
A website operated by a distributor or other supplier (not the publisher) and aimed at consumers

column2: Supplier’s website for a specified work
column3: A distributor or supplier’s webpage describing a specified work

column2: Supplier’s B2B website for a specified work
column3: A distributor or supplier’s webpage describing a specified work, and aimed at trade customers

column2: Supplier’s B2C website for a specified work
column3: A distributor or supplier’s webpage describing a specified work, and aimed at consumers

column2: Supplier’s website for a group or series of works
column3: A distributor or supplier’s webpage describing a group or series of works
